title: Легальный допинг
overview: A young sportswoman who dreams of winning an Olympic Gold, decides to get pregnant in order to help her chances, as the early stages of pregnancy, known as ‘legal dope', are thought to produce a hormone which encourages growth. Unfortunately, however, in her case, the hormones have an adverse effect and instead of transforming her into a sporting legend, they turn her into a woman who wants to fall in love and settle down.
